onClick.url: function(t,f) {var id = f.get('id'); id = id.replace('sORF', ''); return 'http://sorfs.org/database/'+id;}
onClick.title: Featuree at sORFs.org

metadata.shortInfo: sORF.org - Experimentally confirmed and predicted sORFs collected from the sORF C. elegans database (July 2020). Small open reading frames (sORFs) are open reading frames in the reference genome that are =<300 nucleoticed (100 amino acids).

AnABlast - AnABlast peak calls integrated from http://www.bioinfocabd.upo.es/celegans (July 2020) for potential Small open reading frames (sORFs), these are in the <300 nucleotide range and potentially encode peptides up to 100 amino acids in length.
